column6: Discover the shocking truth behind the World War II adventures of Marvel's original heroes, as Captain America, Bucky, and the valiant men of the military's all-superhuman squadron give all to defeat the Axis! But a sinister secret lies behind their mission...and it takes no less a meddler than Loki, the God of Trickery, to bring it to light!
column8: | penciller:Carmine Di Giandomenico | writer:PAUL JENKINS | penciller (cover):Mico Suayan
